CustomField.description:
#number of days left in the EBD month ( (IF( MONTH( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ), MONTH ( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ) + 1, 1 ) - 1 )- Estimated_Bill_Date__c) / #divided by number of days in the EBD month DAY(DATE(YEAR(Estimated_Bill_Date__c ),(IF(MONTH(Estimated_Bill_Date__c )+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(Estimated_Bill_Date__c )+1)),1)-1) )
#multiplied by monthly charge * MRC__c
# added to the total monthly charge for the rest of the FY + IF( ISNULL( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ) ,0,IF(ISPICKVAL( Charge_Type__c,"MRC"), ( MRC__c * CASE( MONTH(Estimated_Bill_Date__c ) , 1,3, 2,2, 3,1, 16-MONTH( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ))) ,0)) #minus one month for the pro-rated value - MRC__c
CustomField.formula:
( (IF( MONTH( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ), MONTH ( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ) + 1, 1 ) - 1 )- Estimated_Bill_Date__c) / DAY(DATE(YEAR(Estimated_Bill_Date__c ),(IF(MONTH(Estimated_Bill_Date__c )+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(Estimated_Bill_Date__c )+1)),1)-1) )
* MRC__c
+ IF( ISNULL( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ) ,0,IF(ISPICKVAL( Charge_Type__c,"MRC"), ( MRC__c * CASE( MONTH(Estimated_Bill_Date__c ) , 1,3, 2,2, 3,1, 16-MONTH( Estimated_Bill_Date__c ))) ,0))
- MRC__c
CustomField.label: AOP MRC
